'''Skin Pack 3''', named '''Skin Pack 3 - Classic''' {{in|bedrock}}, is a [[skin pack]] that includes 44 skins (45 {{in|LCE}}) referencing various characters from ''[[Minecraft]]'' and other popular video games.
